name: Agra the Agoraphobe
description:
Agra is an Agoraphobe.

That's no way to live. 

He needs food, vitamin D and social interaction in order to really survive. As he goes out and gets these things he'll become braver and even be able to stay outside longer!

This was an entry for the Free Lives Game Jam 2017.

All assets created by CrissOle :)

Enjoy and let me know what you think!
